name: Party Pugs: Beach Puzzle GO!
description:
Are you ready to get down with the most adorable party animals around? Well, get down to the beach because the Party Pugs have arrived!!
Party Pugs is a light hearted but tricky turn based game where players control a loveable, thug like pug to battle across the beach to reach the Party Pug bus. But make sure you watch out for the police, get caught and it’s GAME OVER!
Watch your party friends dance as you collect and dig for items and dodge police on your adventure across the beach. They don’t call it hair of the dog for nothing, these pugs will put you to shame with their raving, shaking and dancing skills.
Has your Party Pug got the swag to survive?

Key Features:
Play with 50 adorable pug friends.
Endless off the leash fun with over 100 challenging levels!
Chill on 10 different beaches with your pugs.
You diggin’ it? Your pugs can dig up beaches to find pawsome prizes!
Did we mention pugs??

*Please note – this game is free to play, however some items may be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings.
**This game does not support iPhone 3GS, iPad 1, iPod Touch 4th Generation or earlier devices.

Connect with All 4 Games -
Website: www.all4games.co.uk
Twitter: https://twitter.com/All_4_Games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/all4gamesofficial/

In order to deliver a personalised, responsive service and to improve the game, we remember and store information about how you use it. The information is completely anonymous and will never include any personal details. It is used only by Channel 4 or the trusted partners we work with. If you wish, you can switch off our analytics software within the “Options” screen of the game. The game contains promotions for Channel 4’s other products and services as well as some promotions of third party products and services. By downloading this application, you agree to our terms of use (http://www.channel4.com/programmes/all-4-games/articles/all/game-terms-and-conditions), privacy policy and cookies policy.
